source: Title: Chiffon Cake, Ingredients: 2 c. flour 1 1/2 c. sugar 3 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. salt 1/2 c. source: Title: Eccles Cakes, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons butter 1/4 pound currants 1 ounce candied orange peel diced 1/4 cup light brown sugar 1 lemon zested 1/2 teaspoon ground allspice 1/2 pound frozen puff pastry thawed 1 egg white lightly beaten granulated sugar for dusting, Steps: Preheat the oven to 425°F. Grease a baking sheet. Melt the butter, remove from the heat and mix in the currants, candied orange peel, sugar, lemon zest and allspice. On a lightly floured work surface, roll out the puff pastry and cut out 8 x 4 inch discs. Distribute the filling between the center of each disc. Brush the edges with egg white and seal. Turn over and lightly roll with a rolling pin. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Brush the tops with egg white and sprinkle with sugar. Make 3 slits in the top of each cake then bake for 15 mins, until golden. Allow to cool on a wire rack. Serve warm or cold. Will keep for 1 week in a sealed container.
references: Title: 葡萄干蛋糕, Ingredients: 2个鸡蛋 20克玉米油 30克牛奶 50克低筋面粉 40克细砂糖 20克葡萄干 10克核桃, Steps: 准备reparation蛋黄蛋白分离，置于无油无水的盆中，蛋白冷冻至边缘有薄冰，备用。1取出冷冻蛋白，打蛋器高速搅拌至起大的泡沫时，加入13细砂糖2继续搅拌至泡沫变得细腻，再加入13细砂糖3继续搅拌至蛋白霜即将失去流动性，加入剩余细砂糖，保持高速搅拌4将蛋白霜打发至干性，拉起的蛋白霜呈大尖角 1玉米油加入牛奶，加热40搅拌均匀2蛋黄中加入细砂糖，搅拌至砂糖10g融化3筛入低粉搅拌均匀4用刮刀取13蛋白霜到蛋黄糊里5用手动打蛋器划方式将蛋白霜与蛋黄糊混合，颜色均为没结块6余下蛋白霜到蛋黄糊里，搅拌均匀 1距离20高度将蛋糊倒入模具，加入葡萄干、核桃仁，葡萄干温水泡10分钟再用2烤箱预热180。放入烤箱后150，30分钟，出炉前五分钟，牙签插入蛋糕，牙签粘有蛋糕表示未熟，适当加长5-10分钟。 1出炉倒扣放凉，蛋糕不烫手时将纸撕开

source: Title: Fruitcake, Ingredients: 1 lb candied cherry (green or red) 1 lb candied pineapple 14 lb citron (I use 8 oz. mixed fruit) 12 ounces brazil nuts (cut each whole nut into 5 pcs.) 2 lbs pecans 2 (15 ounce) boxes raisins (1 golden and 1 dark, I use both golden) 12 lb dates, cut up 2 cups butter, at room temperature 3 12 cups sugar 10 large eggs or 12 eggs, if eggs are small, at room temperature 1 cup wine (Morgan David Blackberry Royal) 4 cups all-purpose flour (sift flour with the following spices --) 1 12 teaspoons cinnamon 1 12 teaspoons allspice 1 teaspoon nutmeg 1 teaspoon clove 1 12 teaspoons baking powder 1 14 teaspoons salt, Steps: Cut up fruits and nuts. Either soak overnight in 1 cup of wine or flour nuts and leave overnight. I soak fruit in wine. Makeup cake batter- Cream butter and sugar. Then add 1 egg at a time until all eggs are added. Then add flour. After beating batter good, pur batter into pan with nuts and fruit and mix well. Line pan with brown paper sack or wax paper. Just line the bottom of the pan. Grease paper with oil. Bake 1 1/2 to 2 hours at 250 degrees. My cakes took 4 hours. Check cakes after 1 1/2 hours to see if cakes are light brown. Cakes should bake until darker. When cakes are done cool on rack in pan. Use knife on sides to loosen after cakes cool. Soak cheese cloth with wine and place on cakes. Wrap cakes and store in cool place. Cakes should be soaked 3 or 4 times.

source: Title: Marble Cake, Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. butter 1/2 c. milk 1 1/2 c. flour 2 tsp. baking powder whites of 4 eggs, Steps: Cream butter and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Add the milk and mix well. Add flour and baking powder. Mix well. Beat egg whites until stiff and fold into mixture. Pour mixture into a greased and floured 9 x 9-inch pan, keeping a small portion of batter in mixing bowl. Drop 4 to 5 drops of red food coloring into remaining mixture. Mix well and drop by a spoonful at a time over the mixture in the pan. (This makes the marble effect.) Bake at 350° for 45 minutes or until done. If desired, frost with favorite frosting.

source: Title: Sponge Cake, Ingredients: 1 c. flour 2 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. almond 2 Tbsp. water 1 1/4 c. sugar 7 egg yolks 7 egg whites 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar, Steps: Sift flour once, measure and sift 4 times. Add water and 1/2 cup sugar, vanilla and almond to egg yolks and beat with mixer until very thick and light. Add flour all at once and stir until just blended. Beat egg whites and salt with mixer. When foamy, add cream of tartar. Continue to beat until egg whites are stiff enough to hold up in peaks, but not dry. Add remaining 3/4 cup sugar. Fold in egg yolk mixture. Bake in ungreased tube pan at 325° for 1 hour.

source: Title: Chicken Curry, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour 4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves (6 ounces each) 1 tablespoon plus 2 teaspoons olive oil 1 medium onion, finely chopped (3/4 cup) 2 garlic cloves, minced 2 teaspoons medium to hot curry powder Coarse salt 3/4 pound small red potatoes, cut into 1/2-inch chunks 1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes (preferably zesty flavored), with juice Rice Plain yogurt Raisins Toasted almonds Store-bought mango chutney, Steps: Place the flour on a plate. Transfer the chicken to a bowl; set aside. Heat the remaining 2 teaspoons oil in the same skillet; cook the onion and garlic, stirring frequently, until the onion is softened, about 5 minutes. Stir in the curry powder and 3/4 teaspoon salt; cook for 1 minute more. Add the potatoes and 1 cup water; bring to a boil. source: Title: Tasty Lamb Kebabs, Ingredients: 3 lbs boneless leg of lamb, trimmed of fat and cut into 1-inch chunks 12 cup freshly squeezed lemon juice 1 tablespoon olive oil 3 cloves garlic, minced 12 teaspoon ground cumin 12 teaspoon ground oregano 14 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper 1 large red bell pepper, stemmed and seeded,and cut into 1-inch squares 1 large green bell pepper, stemmed and seeded,and cut into 1-inch squares 12 lb small fresh mushrooms, cleaned and stems removed, Steps: The night before, marinate lamb: In a large glass or plastic bowl, place lamb chunks. In a mixing bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, cumin, oregano, and pepper. Pour over lamb, seal tightly, and refrigerate overnight (if you must do this closer to dinner, marinate for at least a few hours). At dinner time, preheat grill or broiler. Drain marinade from lamb chunks and place meat on skewers, alternating with peppers and mushrooms (if using wooden skewers, soak in water for 30 minutes before using so they won't burn). Grill or broil 5 to 7 minutes on one side, then turn and cook for 5 minutes more; cook longer if desired. When meat is done to your liking, place skewers on a warmed platter and serve immediately.
references: Title: 羊肉串, Ingredients: 400克羊后腿 100克羊排 15根签子 少量孜然粉 少量盐 少量辣椒粉, Steps: 羊腿肉切块，羊排去骨大小自己把握，约2厘米见方 后腿与羊排按4比1配比串好，当然全用后腿或全用羊排也行。 真正的串不需要腌制前提你的羊肉必须新鲜 碳火准备好，要那种烧到一半的碳最好，串放上去，先别放盐，这时候放就老了。到五成熟放孜然，翻面，压一压，八成熟放盐，辣椒面，压一压。 开瓶燕京，叫上铁瓷，蹲路边开撸吧。
prediction: Title: 香辣羊肉饼, Ingredients: 500克羊肉 1个鸡蛋 适量盐 适量生抽 适量老抽 适量料酒 适量胡椒粉 适量葱姜蒜 适量十三香 适量蚝油 适量白糖 适量淀粉 适量面粉 适量水, Steps: 羊肉切成小块,加入盐、生抽、老抽、料酒、胡椒粉、十三香、淀粉抓匀,腌制半小时以上。 葱姜蒜切末备用。 锅中倒入适量油,放入葱姜蒜末爆香。 放入羊肉翻炒至变色。 放入调好的料汁翻炒均匀。 倒入适量清水,盖上锅盖,大火烧开后转小火焖煮15分钟。 出锅前撒上葱花即可。

source: Title: Mashed Potatoes, Ingredients: 5 lb. potatoes 1/4 c. butter 1/4 tsp. garlic salt 8 oz. cream cheese, softened 1 small carton sour cream, Steps: Peel and cook potatoes. Mash with butter, then add other ingredients. May be put in baking dish to store in refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
references: Title: 土豆泥, Ingredients: 土豆 牛奶 黄油 香蒜酱, Steps: 土豆洗净去皮切块，放入水中煮熟。用电压力煲的话，能更快使土豆完全熟透 煮熟后的土豆，捞出沥干水分，碾压成泥，加入牛奶，搅拌均匀。用搅拌机搅拌的话，可以把土豆、牛奶一起搅碎，会更方便快速。喜欢稀一些口感的，就多放些牛奶，喜欢土豆口感的，就少放些牛奶，也可以不搅得太碎，保留土豆的颗粒感 搅拌好的土豆泥中拌入香蒜酱，或者根据你的喜好添加火腿丁、蔬菜，搅拌均匀即可

references: Title: 草莓奶昔, Ingredients: 15个草莓 一瓶酸奶 5克炼乳, Steps: 这么大的草莓用了15个，其实多少都无所谓啦，不用太精确。 用的安慕希酸奶，加了一点炼乳因为草莓本身就有点酸，可以用炼乳增加香甜度。把材料放到榨汁杯里用的摩飞，说实话挺好用的，而且很美貌，之前还买了九阳的胶囊杯，杯垫很快就黄了呵呵打20s左右，奶昔就做好啦 可以再做个奶盖哈哈哈哈，怕摄入太多热量就没做，下次做了发。

source: Title: Minestrone Soup, Ingredients: 1/2 c. olive oil 2 large Spanish onions, cut up 4 to 6 cloves garlic, chopped 2 to 4 carrots, peeled and cut up 3 large stalks celery 1 1/2 tsp. salt 1 medium size head green cabbage, cut up 8 to 10 kale leaves, cut up 1/2 tsp. thyme 2 bay leaves 3 qt. water 1 (28 oz.) can plum tomatoes, broken up (with liquid) 1 c. small pasta (tubelli or shells) 1 (16 oz.) can chickpeas (with liquid) black pepper, Steps: Place oil in a 10-quart pot. Add onions, garlic, carrots, celery and 1/2 teaspoon salt; cook over low heat until onions are wilted, but not brown. Add cabbage, kale, thyme, bay leaves and rest of salt. Increase heat, stirring constantly for one minute. Add water, tomatoes and chickpeas; bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer 45 minutes. Add pasta and cook 15 minutes more, until pasta is tender. Correct seasonings.
references: Title: 意式牛肉杂菜汤, Ingredients: 2只西红柿 1个土豆 1根胡萝卜 13颗卷心菜 一根芹菜 20克黄油 200克牛肉 2汤匙番茄酱 适量盐 13颗洋葱, Steps: 所有蔬菜切丁，牛肉切片焯水后切丁。准备1000毫升滚水。 锅加热后，放入黄油，完全融化后，放入洋葱煸炒。接着放入西红柿丁，保持大火，炒两三分钟，加番茄酱。 放入牛肉，稍加搅拌后一次性倒入滚水。煮开，倒入剩下所有的蔬菜。再次煮开。 如果有高压锅，可移入，闷20-30分钟即可。普通锅需要焖煮40分钟左右。出锅前放适量盐。 传统做法还有炒熟面粉，然后加入汤中这个步骤，但如果是给宝宝吃，我觉得不需要那么浓稠。

source: Title: Paella, Ingredients: 1 c. olive oil 1 chicken (2 lb.), cut up 1 large onion, chopped 1 clove garlic, chopped 1 green pepper, chopped 2 c. converted rice (Uncle Ben's) 1 tsp. saffron 1 c. frozen peas 1 lb. shrimp, shelled (raw) 12 mussels 1 c. red pimento 4 c. water 1 tsp. parsley salt to taste, Steps: Heat olive oil and brown chicken pieces on all sides. source: Title: Seafood Spaghetti, Ingredients: 2 Tbsp. sliced onion 3 cloves garlic, crushed 2 tsp. parsley flakes butter 2 cans (6 1/2 oz. each) minced clams 1 (4 1/2 oz.) can shrimp 1 Tbsp. cornstarch cooked spaghetti (I use 3 c. broken pieces for this recipe) butter 3 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese, Steps: Saute onion, garlic and parsley in butter until tender. Drain clams and shrimp, reserving liquid so you have enough for 1 cup, or add water to make 1 cup. source: Title: Black Bread, Ingredients: 1 envelope yeast, active dry 1 teaspoon sugar 1/4 cup water warm, 105 - 115 degrees F 1/2 ounce chocolate unsweetened 1 tablespoon margarine 1 1/4 cups water 1/4 cup molasses dark 2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar 1 tablespoon salt 1/2 cup all-bran cereal 2 cups flour, all-purpose up to 2 3/4 cups if needed 1 1/2 cups rye flour, Steps: Makes 2 loaves Sprinkle yeast and sugar over 1/4 cup water; stir to dissolve. Let stand until foamy, about 10 minutes. Melt chocolate and margarine with 1 1/4 cups water in large bowl set over gently simmering water. Stir until smooth. Remove from over water. Blend in molasses, vinegar and salt. Mix in cereal. Let cool. Grease large bowl. Blend yeast into cereal mixture. Gradually stir in 2 cups all-purpose flour and rye flour. Turn dough out onto lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes, kneading in up to 3/4 cup more all-purpose flour if necessary to form workable dough. Add dough to prepared bowl, turning to coat entire surface. Cover and let rise in warm draft-free area until doubled in volume, about 2 hours. Grease two 3x2x7-inch loaf pans. Punch dough down. Turn out onto lightly floured surface and let rest 3 minutes. Knead 3 minutes. Divide dough in half. Roll each into 7x8-inch rectangle. Starting with long side, roll dough up into cylinder. Tuck ends under and pinch seam to seal. Place seam side down in prepared pans. Cover and let rise in warm draft-free area until doubled, about 1 1/2 hours. Preheat oven to 375F (190C). Bake until loaves sound hollow when tapped on bottom, about 45 minutes. Remove bread from pans. Let cool completely on rack before serving.
references: Title: 黑麦面包, Ingredients: 200克金牌面包粉 50克黑麦粉 4克干鲜酵母 5克盐 165克水 5克脱脂奶粉 5克橄榄油, Steps: 面团材料混合，揉至扩展 室温发酵至25倍大 排气、分割成6份，滚圆后，盖上保鲜膜，室温静置，松弛15分钟 排气后的面团，翻面，擀成椭圆形 面团上部13处往下折叠 面团下部13处往上折叠 上下对折，收口处捏紧 将棒状面团的两端搓得细一点，成橄榄状 放入法棍模子中 二次发酵至15倍大，在面团的表面纵向割上一刀，表面喷水，入预热200度的烤箱，下层，上下火，18分钟左右，出炉放凉，密封保存
prediction: Title: 黑麦黑麦面包, Ingredients: 250克高筋面粉 50克黑麦粉 30克细砂糖 3克盐 3克酵母 20克黄油 适量黑芝麻, Steps: 除黄油外所有材料放入厨师机揉至扩展阶段 加入黄油继续揉至完全阶段 加入黑芝麻揉至完全阶段,盖上保鲜膜室温发酵至两倍大 取出排气,分割成6等份,滚圆松弛15分钟 取一个面团擀成椭圆形,翻面后卷起,收口朝下放入吐司盒,进行最后发酵 发酵至八分满,表面刷蛋液,撒上黑芝麻 放入预热好的烤箱中层,上下火180度,烘烤20分钟左右

source: Title: Banana Bread, Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 2/3 c. oil 3 or 4 bananas, mashed 1 tsp. vanilla 2 eggs 2 c. flour 1 tsp. soda dash of salt, Steps: Combine all ingredients in order given. Mix well. Pour into loaf pan and bake at 350°. Bread is done when top springs back when touched.
references: Title: 香蕉面包, Ingredients: 100g低粉 2根香蕉烂的最佳 5个鸡蛋 20g砂糖 50g色拉油 3g盐 3-4g泡打粉, Steps: 用note写了步骤，鸡蛋有次只放了2个效果也不错 方子面包机和烤箱都适用，封面就是面包机的蛋糕功能做的
prediction: Title: 香蕉面包, Ingredients: 1根香蕉 1个鸡蛋 适量牛奶 适量面包糠, Steps: 香蕉切片,放入碗中,加入适量牛奶,搅拌均匀。 鸡蛋打散,加入面包糠中,搅拌均匀,放入烤盘中。 烤箱预热180度,烤20分钟。

source: Title: Beef Wellington, Ingredients: 250 g fillet beef steaks 6 shiitake mushrooms 4 shallots or 1 small red onion 4 garlic cloves 1 tablespoon prepared English mustard 4 slices cooked sliced ham 1 egg, beaten to a wash puff pastry, Steps: Either fry the fillet steak in very hot oil or butter (60 seconds each side) or sear the steak with a blowlamp until charred on all sides. Allow the steak to rest and cool. Finely chop the mushrooms, shallots and garlic and stir fry in hot olive oil for about 5 minutes. Keep aside. Lay two slices of cooked ham with a slight overlap on a sheet of cling film on a chopping board. Spread half of the duxelles over the slices in an even thickness. Place the fillet steak on the duxelles. Coat the steak with the mustard. Add the remainder of the duxelles to the top of the steak and then the remaining two slices of ham. Wrap the cling film around the steak and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Roll out the pastry and wrap the steak roll completely. Use egg yolk wash to seal the pastry and then coat the pastry completely. Fork over the top of the pastry. Preheat the oven to 180 degC. Place the Wellington on a baking tray and bake until brown, turning once. Allow to stand for 10 minutes then carve and serve with beef gravy if desired.
references: Title: 惠灵顿牛排, Ingredients: 4块菲力牛排 2斤杏鲍菇香菇口蘑 2包火腿 适量黄芥末酱 2个蛋黄 适量黄油 半个洋葱 适量酥皮, Steps: 准备的材料牛菲力就是牛里脊 先用厨房纸吸干水分和血水 表面撒盐 现磨的黑胡椒味道会好很多 静置15分钟 放一块黄油煎一下牛排四周都煎一下 特殊时期煎的火候大了一些平时做只要四周煎上色里面是嫩的就可以 开始切蘑菇不要用搅拌机就是切带颗粒的那种 放点黄油炒可以少放一点盐让蘑菇多出水千万少放要不后面配了火腿会很咸再放一些黑胡椒 抄到水分都炒出来了干干的就可以盛出来放凉了一定要炒的尽量干 抹上黄芥末酱这里我其实买错酱了应该买单独的黄芥末酱这个里面还有青椒和腌黄瓜不过还好不影响后面的味道 顺序依次是一层火腿一层蘑菇酱牛排 包好放冰箱冷冻1-2小时 取出来定型之后好包裹酥皮 酥皮上刷蛋黄液包好之后放冰箱冷冻一晚上 这是包好了的第二天取出来表面可以划上一点花纹烤之前刷蛋黄液 200度高温20分钟醒10分钟就可以切了 酥脆 摆盘 咬一口满分
prediction: Title: 惠灵顿牛排, Ingredients: 1块牛排 1个鸡蛋 适量黑胡椒 适量盐 适量橄榄油 适量黄油, Steps: 牛排解冻后,用厨房纸吸干水分。 鸡蛋打散,加入适量盐,黑胡椒,橄榄油,搅拌均匀。 平底锅加热,放入黄油,融化后,放入牛排,煎至两面金黄。 将煎好的牛排放入平底锅中,小火煎至两面焦黄。

source: Title: Fish And Chips, Ingredients: 1 3/4 pounds red or Yukon gold potatoes, cut into 1-inch chunks 4 tablespoons olive oil 1 1/4 teaspoons kosher salt 1 1/4 teaspoons black pepper 8 sprigs fresh thyme 4 6-ounce pieces cod 1 lemon, halved 1 clove garlic, thinly sliced 2 tablespoons capers, drained, Steps: Heat toaster oven to 450° F. Place the potatoes, 2 tablespoons of the oil, 1 teaspoon of the salt, 1/4 teaspoon of the pepper, and 4 sprigs of the thyme in the toaster-oven baking tray and toss. Spread in a single layer and bake, stirring occasionally, until golden, 25 to 30 minutes. Transfer to a large piece of aluminum foil and wrap to keep warm. Wipe out tray. Place the cod in tray. Thinly slice half the lemon. Top the cod with the lemon slices, garlic, capers, and the remaining salt, pepper, and thyme sprigs. Drizzle with the remaining oil. Bake until cooked through, 8 to 12 minutes, depending on size. Transfer the cod and potatoes to individual plates. Squeeze the remaining lemon half over the tray and return to oven until the juices are warmed through, about 5 minutes. Pour the sauce over the fish and potatoes.
references: Title: 炸鱼薯条, Ingredients: 英式炸鱼： 200g真鳕鱼 63g低筋面粉 20g玉米淀粉 15g泡打粉 110g冰啤酒 少许柠檬汁 炸薯条： 2个马铃薯, Steps: 马铃薯去皮切成细长条，在水中浸泡五分钟左右，再冲洗两遍，去除表面的淀粉。煮一锅开水，加一小勺盐，薯条入锅煮两分钟左右，捞起晾干水分，放入冰箱冷冻变硬，大概需时两小时，建议可提前一晚处理，随取随炸。 冰鲜真鳕鱼自然解冻，去皮切块，用少许的盐、黑胡椒粉、柠檬汁，腌制十五分钟。 低筋面粉、玉米淀粉、泡打粉混合均匀。 粉类里加入冰啤酒，用筷子或手动打蛋器划十字翻拌均匀，切记不要画圈顺时针搅拌，免得面糊起筋。做好的面糊的浓稠度，应该是用手抓起时，会向下流形成一条不间断的直线。 五六成油温，大约160度下薯条炸两分钟，捞起，复炸，170度油温再炸一分钟左右。具体时间按薯条粗细大小适当增加。 将鳕鱼块均匀的裹上面糊，五成油温150度下锅炸约两分钟，捞起，复炸，油温升高至六成热180度再炸一分钟左右，至金黄色。具体油炸时间按鱼块的大小决定。 炸鱼配塔塔酱，薯条配番茄酱。
prediction: Title: 香煎鳕鱼片, Ingredients: 1块鳕鱼 适量盐 适量黑胡椒 适量橄榄油, Steps: 鳕鱼洗净,用厨房纸巾吸干水分,用厨房纸吸干水分。 锅中放入橄榄油,放入鳕鱼,煎至两面金黄。 放入适量盐和黑胡椒,翻炒均匀即可。

source: Title: Duck A L'Orange, Ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon olive oil 2 boned, skinned duck breast halves (about 8 oz. each) or 1 lb. boned, skinned chicken thighs 1 red onion (7 oz.), peeled, halved, and thinly sliced crosswise 1 cup orange juice 2/3 cup fat-skimmed chicken broth 1/4 cup orange marmalade 1 teaspoon lemon juice 1 teaspoon red wine vinegar 1 orange (8 oz.), rinsed, halved, and very thinly sliced crosswise (end pieces and seeds discarded) 1 cup couscous 1/4 cup medium-size green olives such as Picholine, pitted and coarsely chopped Salt and pepper, Steps: Pour olive oil into a 10- to 12-inch nonstick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add duck breasts and cook, turning once, until well browned on the outside and barely pink in center of thickest part (cut to test), 12 to 15 minutes total. With tongs, transfer duck to a rimmed plate and cover with foil. Add onion to pan and stir often until limp, about 5 minutes. Add orange juice, broth, marmalade, lemon juice, vinegar, and orange slices; boil, stirring occasionally, until mixture has thickened and is reduced by half, about 15 minutes. Meanwhile, in a 1- to 2-quart pan over high heat, bring 1 1/4 cups water to a boil. Stir in couscous, cover, and remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes. Pull duck into 2-inch-long shreds, or cut into 2-inch pieces or 1/4-inch-thick slices. Add to orange sauce along with any accumulated juices and the olives; stir until mixture is hot. Add salt and pepper to taste. Gently fluff couscous with a fork. Spoon onto plates and top equally with duck and sauce.
references: Title: 橙汁木瓜, Ingredients: 200g去皮去籽的重量木瓜半个 25克白砂糖 一茶匙约3g蜂蜜 40g橙汁, Steps: 准备好食材。 橙子榨汁过滤一遍40g备用。喜欢稍带酸口的亲，可以加点柠檬汁 木瓜去皮去籽。 木瓜切成3mm的片。厚薄没有硬性要求，切成自己喜欢的厚度就可。不过太薄了不好摆盘造型哈 取木瓜中间最高处开始摆盘，如图。您喜欢的造型想怎么摆就怎么摆哦相信您是最棒哒 木瓜片一片一片的往上摞，用短一些的木瓜片填满中间的空白处。 摆盘成形的木瓜。 不粘锅的锅子入白砂糖、橙汁小火搅拌煮至砂糖融化，这时不能再搅拌了在搅拌糖液易凝固翻沙。继续小火熬煮，小火、小火、小火全程都是小火哈重要的事说三遍 橙汁糖液煮至起泡加蜂蜜，摇晃一下锅子，使蜂蜜与橙汁糖液混为一体后离火。 熬好的橙汁糖液是这个样子滴。 待橙汁糖液稍凉一会儿大概85左右，均匀的淋入木瓜片上。 这盘菜，点缀一下哈哈解腻爽口开胃，让你食欲大振 这是我之前做的。不用刻意的摆盘，切好直接入盘稍加装饰也不错哒
prediction: Title: 橙香鸭胸, Ingredients: 1块鸭胸肉 1个橙子 适量盐 适量黑胡椒 适量料酒 适量生抽 适量蚝油 适量淀粉, Steps: 鸭胸肉洗净,切成小块,放入盐、黑胡椒、料酒、生抽、蚝油、淀粉抓匀,腌制15分钟。 橙子切片,放入腌制好的鸭胸肉中。 锅中倒入适量油,放入鸭胸肉,煎至两面金黄。 加入橙子片,翻炒至橙子片变软。 加入鸭胸肉,翻炒均匀。 加入适量水,盖上锅盖,大火烧开,转小火焖煮10分钟。 出锅前加入适量盐和黑胡椒调味即可。

source: Title: Coq Au Vin, Ingredients: 4 slices bacon, chop and cook til crispy 1/2 cup butter 2 broiler-fryer chickens, cut into quarters 16 small white pearl onions (peeled and left whole) 16 large mushrooms, sliced 2 garlic cloves (minced) 1 bunch scallion (cleaned and cut up) 1/4 cup flour 3 cups dry red table wine 2 chicken bouillon cubes 1 cup boiling water 2 teaspoons salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1/2 teaspoon thyme 1 bay leaf, Steps: Preheat cooker/fryer to 300 degrees. Cook bacon till crisp. Remove and reserve. Add butter to bacon fat and brown chicken pieces. Remove chicken and reserve. Lightly cook onions and mushrooms. Remove. Pour out drippings and reserve 2 tablespoons in cooker. Cook garlic and scallions till limp. Stir in flour and cook 2 minutes till flour has browned. Turn off heat. Stir in wine, bouillon and 1 cup of boiling water. Turn heat up to 300 degrees and stir till mix comes to a boil. Add salt, pepper, thyme and bayleaf. Stir. Add bacon, chicken, onions and mushrooms. Cover. Turn heat to simmer and cook for 30 to 45 minutes till chicken in tender. Remove bayleaf before serving.
references: Title: 香炖萝卜鸡, Ingredients: 一只土鸡 一个白萝卜 一把干蘑菇 适量葱姜蒜 三个干辣椒, Steps: 鸡洗净，剁小块。蘑菇洗净泡发。萝卜切块。 锅中加油，花椒大茴，姜片，干辣椒，爆香锅。倒入鸡翻炒。 炒到啪啪响，加入葱段，倒入一勺料酒去腥。加耗油一勺，老抽一勺，翻炒均匀。倒入萝卜块。翻炒均匀。加入开水，没过鸡。水开后倒入泡好的蘑菇。大火五分钟，转小火，炖至汤汁粘稠，萝卜和鸡软烂。加入蒜末，适量盐，香醋，出锅。
prediction: Title: 红酒炖牛腩, Ingredients: 牛腩 红酒 姜 葱 料酒 生抽 老抽 冰糖 盐, Steps: 牛腩洗净,冷水下锅,加姜片,料酒,大火煮开,撇去浮沫,转小火慢炖。 炖至牛腩软烂,加入红酒,生抽,老抽,冰糖,盐,大火收汁即可。

source: Title: Omelet, Ingredients: 8 eggs 3 Tbsp. milk or half and half dash of pepper 1 1/4 tsp. salt 2 Tbsp. butter, Steps: Combine eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Beat slightly. Melt butter; add egg mixture. Cook over low heat until set but top is still shiny. Lift omelet. Let egg mixture flow below omelet. Fold omelet in half. Serve at once.
references: Title: 苏格兰蛋, Ingredients: 4个鸡蛋 适量猪肉末 适量姜末 适量葱末 1勺盐 1勺白胡椒 1勺料酒 1勺生抽 1勺耗油 适量淀粉 2个鸡蛋液 适量面包糠, Steps: 水里加盐和白醋煮沸放入四个鸡蛋，煮五分钟捞出放入冷水中。 猪肉末加入姜末，葱末，盐，白胡椒，料酒，生抽，耗油，搅拌均匀。把鸡蛋剥壳，用煮肉末包裹鸡蛋。 依次沾淀粉，鸡蛋液，面包糠，下锅小火炸6分钟，捞出即可
prediction: Title: 西葫芦鸡蛋饼, Ingredients: 1个西葫芦 1个鸡蛋 适量面粉 适量盐 适量胡椒粉 适量葱花, Steps: 准备好食材 西葫芦去皮切成小块 鸡蛋打散,加入适量面粉,盐,胡椒粉,葱花,搅拌均匀 平底锅放少许油,倒入搅拌好的蛋液,小火煎至两面金黄即可

source: Title: Crepes, Ingredients: 1/2 c. all-purpose flour 1 tsp. sugar 1/4 tsp. baking powder 1/4 tsp. salt 2/3 c. milk 1 egg 1/4 tsp. vanilla 2 tsp. butter 1 c. cider, Steps: Beat all ingredients with rotary beater until smooth. Grease a pan with butter. Cook until light brown, like pancakes. Turn and brown other side. After, you can spread with jam, honey or sugar, or I put some apple or pineapple or peaches inside.
references: Title: 可丽饼, Ingredients: 12杯面粉 1个鸡蛋 14杯牛奶 14杯水 1大勺tablespoon黄油, Steps: 混合所有原料 平底锅摊饼 加果酱或水果上盘
prediction: Title: 酥皮面包, Ingredients: 250克高筋面粉 50克低筋面粉 30克细砂糖 3克盐 3克酵母 20克黄油 适量蛋液刷表面, Steps: 除黄油外所有材料放入面包机,揉至扩展阶段,加入黄油继续揉至完全阶段,盖上保鲜膜发酵至两倍大。 发酵好的面团取出排气,平均分成6份,滚圆松弛15分钟。 取一个面团擀成椭圆形,翻面,卷起,收口朝下放入烤盘。 放入烤箱,二次发酵至2倍大。 烤箱预热180度,中层,上下火,20分钟。

source: Title: Quiche, Ingredients: 8 oz. frozen spinach, chopped 1/2 c. milk 2 eggs 1/2 c. mayonnaise 2 Tbsp. flour 1/3 c. onion, chopped bacon ham cheese, Steps: Mix ingredients. Pour into 9 5/8-inch pie crust. Bake at 325° for 1 hour.
references: Title: 法式咸派, Ingredients: 300g低筋面粉 180g黄油 1茶匙细砂糖 75ml清水 半颗洋葱 适量黄椒 半根玉米 4朵香菇 半根胡萝卜 3瓣大蒜 适量培根 1个鸡蛋 30ml牛奶 少许盐 少许黑胡椒 适量食用油 50ml淡奶油 150g马苏里拉芝士 适量大米或豆子, Steps: 将180g黄油切小块和300g低筋面粉混合 用手揉快速搓成松散的沙粒状 加入75ml清水和1茶匙细砂糖，揉成面团，覆上保鲜膜，静置松弛15分钟 将面团擀成薄厚均匀的面片，厚度为4mm 将面片铺入派盘中，用手轻轻按压，使面皮贴合模具，用擀面杖滚过派盘，去掉多余的派皮 在做好的派皮上放上油纸，放上大米或豆子防止派皮膨起。同时将251开启烘烤模式180度预热 预热结束后，将派皮放入251，180度烘烤15分钟 15分钟结束后，将大米和油纸取出，再次放入251中烘烤10分钟，烘烤结束后，取出烤好的派皮，晾凉备用 将大蒜和香菇切片，洋葱、黄椒、胡萝卜切粒，培根切段，玉米掰粒 将切好的食材放入碗中，拌入食用油、盐、黑胡椒适量，放入251中开启微波模式高火100烹饪2分钟 制蛋奶液：碗中放入鸡蛋、淡奶油、牛奶，加入盐和黑胡椒搅拌均匀 将烹饪过的馅料放入派皮中，表面上放入培根 淋入制好的蛋奶液，再放上马苏里拉芝士 放入251中，开启烘烤模式，180度烘烤10分钟，即可出炉 成品来啦 切开里面长这样子
prediction: Title: 培根芝士焗饭, Ingredients: 适量米饭 适量培根 适量马苏里拉芝士 适量盐 适量黑胡椒 适量橄榄油, Steps: 培根切小块,放入烤箱,200度烤10分钟。 将培根和芝士放入烤盘,撒上盐和黑胡椒。 将烤好的培根芝士铺在米饭上,再撒上马苏里拉奶酪。 烤箱预热200度,烤15分钟即可。

source: Title: Eclair, Ingredients: 4 large eggs 100 grams butter 1 cup flour 1 cup water 2 tsp sugar 1 egg 1 cup sugar 1 tbsp flour 100 grams butter 1 cup water 1 vanilla 1 cinnamon, Steps: For the dough mix together water + sugar + butter and boil. After it boils add flour and quickly mix with a wooden spoon about 1 minute. Take from the gas and let it become cold then one by one add eggs and mix with mixer. Make desired forms on the baking pan and put to oven until it rises and becomes red. For the creme mix together egg + sugar + flour + water and put to oven on a low fire. Mix all the time and when it starts to boil and thicken add butter + vanilla + cinnamon (sticks or powder) Let it become cold then take creme with spoon and put to the ready doughs.
references: Title: 闪电泡芙, Ingredients:  水120g 盐5g 牛奶120g 砂糖10g 黄油120g  高粉67 低粉67  鸡蛋三个  腰果适量 熟花生碎末适量 蔓越莓干适量, Steps: 料放电磁炉上烧，不停的搅拌，直到黄油全化开，牛奶沸腾 分次加入过筛的，边加边搅拌，使面粉烫熟 面团放凉至60度以下，分多次加入鸡蛋，边加边搅拌，搅拌均匀，提起来成三角形 把面糊倒入裱花袋，挤自己喜欢的形状，挤好后用锋利的刀片蘸水划开成型的面糊边缘，两边都要划 上炉230度下炉200度13分钟出炉，根据自己家的炉实际情况来定 把巧克力隔水化开蘸一下泡芙表面，放在晾架上，全部蘸好后放冰箱里冷藏一分钟，拿出来，把闪电泡芙底部戳一个洞，挤入卡仕达酱，或者打发好的奶油，美味的闪电泡芙就完成了。
prediction: Title: 舒芙蕾, Ingredients: 100克低筋面粉 50克黄油 30克糖粉 1个鸡蛋 适量蔓越莓干, Steps: 黄油室温软化,加入糖粉,打发至颜色变浅,体积膨大。 分次加入鸡蛋液,每次都要充分搅拌均匀后再加下一次。 筛入低筋面粉,用刮刀翻拌均匀。 将面糊装入裱花袋,挤在烤盘上。 放入预热好的烤箱中层,上下火180度,20分钟。

source: Title: Galette Des Rois, Ingredients: 1 package (17 Oz.) Frozen Puff Pastry, Thawed (package Should Contain 2 Sheets Of Pastry) 10 ounces, weight Marzipan (60% Almond Paste, 40% Sugar) 2 Tablespoons Softened Butter 2 Tablespoons Sugar 2 Tablespoons Flour 2 whole Eggs 1 teaspoon Rum 1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract 1 whole Large Dried Bean 1 whole Egg, Beaten With 1 Teaspoon Water Powdered Sugar For Decoration, Steps: Roll out the puff pastry sheets to erase the creases and cut each into 10-inch circles. Chill pastry dough. Meanwhile, beat together marzipan, butter, sugar, flour, eggs, rum, and vanilla until smooth to create the frangipane filling. Spread the frangipane over one of the pastry circles, leaving a one-inch border. Press the bean into the filling *. Moisten the border/edge of the pastry with water, then place the second circle on top and press to seal the border. Pierce the top layer in a few places to allow steam to vent during baking, and brush top with egg wash (1 whole egg, beaten mixed with 1 teaspoon of water). Bake in a pre-heated oven at 425 F for 10 minutes, then reduce heat to 350 F and continue baking 15-20 minutes, until golden brown. (Don't open the oven door during the first half of the baking period; the pastry dough needs sustained heat in order to rise, and cool drafts could deflate the glorious puff!) Let galette cool, then dust with powdered sugar. * The one who finds the bean in their slice is crowned king or queen of the day and may bid their "subjects" to do all sorts of silly things!
references: Title: 国王饼, Ingredients: 60g黄油 60g杏仁粉 60g糖 1个鸡蛋 适量蛋黄液 2张千层酥皮 适量糖浆等量的水加糖煮沸, Steps: 将一张面皮放在垫烘焙纸的烤盘上，用盆子或者蛋糕模具印出圆形 杏仁奶油：黄油软化搅拌发白这个天气可以稍微先在炉子上微微加热再搅拌，加入糖搅拌均匀，再加入鸡蛋充分混合，稍微打发，最后加入杏仁粉混合我还加了点盐调味将杏仁奶油倒在压好的圆圈中，圆圈上以及四周刷上少量水 另外一份面皮擀开后盖上去用手指轻轻按压奶油馅四周，让面皮和奶油馅之间的空气排出。再用同样的模具印出圆圈尽量和之前的一个重叠，让刷过水的地方粘连。再用适当大小的圆可以用杯子什么的在四周压出小半圆，最好的办法是用一次性纸杯折成半圆来压 用小刀小心沿着之前印的花纹切出形状。用蛋黄液一个蛋黄加一个鸡蛋和一点点盐搅拌均匀刷一次，放在冰箱里一阵 等第一层蛋液基本干了之后，刷第二层，然后用小刀划出花纹，可以根据自己的喜欢创造发挥用小刀在奶油馅部分戳几刀不要戳穿，只戳开上面一层皮，再在四周的每个半圆上戳一刀。这个步骤是防止烤的过程中里面空气膨胀让表面炸开。 烤箱预热200度，烤一阵之后降温到160度左右出炉趁热刷上糖浆，让表面更闪亮
prediction: Title: 法式红豆酥, Ingredients: 100克黄油 100克低筋面粉 50克糖粉 1个鸡蛋 适量红豆沙, Steps: 黄油室温软化,加入糖粉,打发至颜色变浅,体积膨大。 分次加入鸡蛋液,每次都要充分搅拌均匀后再加下一次。 筛入低筋面粉,用刮刀翻拌均匀。 将面糊装入裱花袋,挤在烤盘上。 烤箱预热180度,中层,上下火,20分钟。

source: Title: Madeleine, Ingredients: 2 Eggs 80 grams Granulated sugar 100 grams Cake flour 1/2 tsp Baking powder 100 grams Unsalted butter 1 half a lemon's worth Lemon zest (you can substitute this with lemon oil), Steps: Combine the flour and the baking powder, then sift. Zest the lemon and melt the butter in a microwave. Crack eggs into a bowl, add the sugar and beat well. Add the flour and the lemon zest and mix until well combined. Add the melted butter in 2-3 doses, and mix until it is well incorporated and the batter is glossy. Cover with plastic wrap and let it rest in the refrigerator for 1 hour~6 hours. You can leave the whisk in the bowl. Prepare the mold while you let the batter rest. Use a ball of plastic wrap and use it to spread shortening on the mold (no need for any flour! ). Or, use a ball of plastic wrap to spread some butter (just the amount left in the bowl that you used to melt it would be enough) on the mold, chill in the refrigerator, then sift some cake flour on it (dust off the excess flour). Mix the batter until it is smooth, then fill the mold by about 80% (I used two spoons). Pop large bubbles with skewers, etc. Bake at 180C for 20 minutes, then remove immediately from the mold and cool. Once they have cooled to room temperature, put them in a bag to keep them from drying out.

source: Title: Scottish Egg, Ingredients: 4 eggs, to boil 12 lemon, grated 1 teaspoon dried parsley, cut into small pieces 1 teaspoon basil, cut into small pieces 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg 100 g breadcrumbs 200 g ground beef 2 uncooked eggs, to mix in the ground meat 100 g blue band butter, Steps: boil the eggs for 4 minutes,take them out from the pan and peel them.set aside. in a bowl,mix the ground meat,the spices (egg and the rest).ohhh.the butter is not included. when the mixing finished,coat the egg with the spiced ground meat (round) like a ball. heat a pan in a medium,melt the butter in and fry the balls.
references: Title: 苏格兰蛋, Ingredients: 4个鸡蛋 适量猪肉末 适量姜末 适量葱末 1勺盐 1勺白胡椒 1勺料酒 1勺生抽 1勺耗油 适量淀粉 2个鸡蛋液 适量面包糠, Steps: 水里加盐和白醋煮沸放入四个鸡蛋，煮五分钟捞出放入冷水中。 猪肉末加入姜末，葱末，盐，白胡椒，料酒，生抽，耗油，搅拌均匀。把鸡蛋剥壳，用煮肉末包裹鸡蛋。 依次沾淀粉，鸡蛋液，面包糠，下锅小火炸6分钟，捞出即可

source: Title: Scones, Ingredients: 4 c. all-purpose flour 4 Tbsp. margarine 1/2 tsp. salt 1 1/4 c. milk 4 tsp. baking powder, Steps: Mix dry ingredients until well mixed. Add margarine. references: Title: 司康饼, Ingredients: 55克火龙果汁 4克泡打粉 2克盐 110克低筋面粉 20克细砂糖 20克黄油 适量奶油, Steps: 火龙果用筛子擦出汁 非常漂亮的颜色 黄油软化，空调外室温超高，都软化成这样了 预热烤箱上下150度，粉类和盐过筛 加入糖和黄油揉均匀 再加入火龙果汁揉均匀，不要过度揉不然面粉起筋 揉好擀开 饼干模具切成自己喜欢的样子 切好 入烤箱上下150度中层20到25分钟，烤箱自己磨合 司康膨胀起来 出炉晾凉，切开，配奶油和果酱吃 完成 这是原味司康
prediction: Title: 司康饼, Ingredients: 克低筋面粉 克牛奶 个鸡蛋 克细砂糖 克黄油 克酵母 克糖粉, Steps: 将面粉、牛奶、鸡蛋、糖粉、酵母放入面包机,启动和面程序。 揉成光滑的面团,盖上保鲜膜发酵至两倍大。 将发酵好的面团取出排气,分成六等份,滚圆松弛15分钟。 将松弛好的面团擀成椭圆形。 从上往下卷起,收口捏紧。 用刀切成小段。 放入烤盘。 放入预热好的烤箱,中层,上下火180度,烤20分钟。

source: Title: Pancake Souffle, Ingredients: 1 teaspoon vanilla extract 2 cups all-purpose flour 1 pinch salt 1 1/2 cups whole milk 6 eggs, seperated 1 cup chocolate chips 8 tablespoons sugar sliced fruit, to top with, Steps: Make sure you have a 12 inch iron skillet. preheat oven to 400 degrees. in one bowl combine egg whites and beat on high adding sugar until it forms stiff peaks(this sugar is seperate from the listed 8 tablespoons ). in another large bowl combine egg yolks flour milk sugar vanilla salt and chocolate chips( if wanted). Then fold in whipped egg whites Heat skillet on high with 1.5 tablespoons butter and pour in mixture and top with fruit if desired. Immediately place in preheated oven for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from pan and top with powdered sugar and slice like a pie and enjoy(you Can also top with maple syrup).

prediction: Title: 小酥饼, Ingredients: 克面粉 克水 克油 克盐 个鸡蛋, Steps: 面粉加水揉成光滑的面团,盖上保鲜膜醒发20分钟。 醒发好的面团擀成薄片,用叉子在面片上扎一些小孔,放入烤箱,上下火180度烤15分钟。

source: Title: Lemon Tart, Ingredients: 1 cup all-purpose flour 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour 4 12 tablespoons sugar 5 tablespoons butter, softened (not melted) 1 egg 1 teaspoon vanilla 18 teaspoon salt 5 eggs 6 ounces sugar 3 lemons, juice of 1 orange, juice of 2 lemons, zest of (grated outer peel) 5 tablespoons butter, Steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. 1. Combine dry ingredients for crust in a bowl. Cream in softened butter. 2. Beat egg with vanilla and salt, and blend into batter. Form into shallow eight-inch straight-sided tart pan (a pie pan also works, but not as well). 3. Cover the tart dough with aluminum foil and fill with about a half-cut of dry red beans or pie weights. Place crust in preheated oven and bake with beans for 10 minutes. (This keeps sides from caving in, and the bottom from bubbling up.) Remove foil and beans and bake another five minutes. Cool crust. Reduce oven heat to 325 degrees. 4. Start the filling by beating the eggs. Blend in sugar slowly. Stir in juice, followed by lemon zest. 5. In a saucepan, melt the butter but don't let it get hot. Stir the butter into the egg-lemon mixture. 6. Pour the filling (it will be very liquid) into the tart shell, and put it in the center of the 325-degree oven. Bake 20 minutes. Allow to cool. Serve with garnish of fresh raspberries or strawberries.
references: Title: 柠檬塔, Ingredients: 塔皮 80g低粉 48g黄油 32g糖粉 15g蛋液 4g奶粉 04g盐 浆料 18g玉米淀粉 136g水 80g糖 20g柠檬汁 30g蛋黄 28g黄油 装饰 6片柠檬, Steps: 黄油擦松，加入糖粉，蛋液逐步放入，加入粉，拌合成团，稍微搓几下 分成6份。模具里放点粉。 取出其中一个剂子，放在塑料袋里，用棍子擀平，擀到比模具大一点，拿出来 塔皮装入模具，用刮刀切去四周多余的部分 塔底扎几个小洞，180度烤10-14分钟左右，边缘黄了就行 塔皮拿出脱模 蛋黄玉米淀粉加糖搅拌均匀后加水，放在600度的电磁炉上搅拌到粘稠。半生半熟的时候最容易糊锅，注意及时离火。 离火后，加入柠檬汁和黄油 趁热把浆液倒入塔皮内，放柠檬片装饰

references: Title: 烤鸡肉串, Ingredients: 腌制鸡肉 鸡腿肉 料酒 姜黄粉 白胡椒粉 生抽 盐 糖 其他配料 红椒 洋葱, Steps: 鸡腿洗干净，去筋骨，去皮，把肉切成小块 放入腌制鸡肉里的那些调料，腌制了一晚上，冰箱过夜 从冰箱去除腌制好的鸡肉 洋葱切块，红椒也切块 然后把他们串起来，顺序是鸡肉，洋葱，红椒，依次这样串起来 先在平底锅里煎一会，差不多变色了就往烤箱里放 烤箱预热200度，10分钟左右就好了
prediction: Title: 烤鸡胸肉, Ingredients: 1块鸡胸肉 适量黑胡椒 适量盐 适量生抽 适量蚝油 适量料酒 适量孜然粉 适量辣椒粉, Steps: 鸡胸肉洗净,用刀背拍松,加入适量盐、黑胡椒、料酒、生抽、蚝油、孜然粉、辣椒粉、孜然粉腌制半小时以上。 烤盘铺锡纸,将腌制好的鸡胸肉放入烤盘,烤箱预热200度,烤20分钟左右。

source: Title: Hearty Vegetable Soup, Ingredients: 2 lean meaty soup bones (preferably beef shank) 1 c. each: any 5 vegetables: sliced carrots, diced celery, sliced zucchini, sliced green beans, sliced leeks, sliced parsnips, chopped cabbage and peeled and cubed potato 3 qt. water 1 can tomatoes, cut up 1 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt 1/2 tsp. seasoned pepper 1 c. barley 1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms, Steps: Brown soup bones either in skillet over high heat or in 400° oven. Combine all ingredients except barley and mushrooms in large soup kettle; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, 2 hours. Add barley; simmer 1 hour longer. Add mushrooms; simmer 10 minutes. Remove soup bones from kettle; let cool slightly. Remove meat from bone; cut meat into pieces and return to soup. Refrigerate overnight. Skin any fat from surface; reheat soup and adjust seasonings before serving.
references: Title: 营养蔬菜汤, Ingredients: 1个番茄 1根胡萝卜 1个土豆 1个包菜 若干盐 若干油 若干水, Steps: 各食材洗净，胡萝卜、土豆切丁，包菜、番茄切得偏小一点 将锅内残留的水烧干，倒略多点的油，将切好的番茄倒入锅中，炒得越烂越好 等番茄炒得差不多，将土豆，胡萝卜，包菜一起放入锅中翻炒 加水开大火煮一会，等水沸腾即可开小火加盐调味
prediction: Title: 营养蔬菜汤, Ingredients: 1个西红柿 1个土豆 1根胡萝卜 1个鸡蛋 适量盐 适量香油 适量葱花, Steps: 西红柿去皮切块,土豆切块,胡萝卜切块,葱花切碎。 热锅冷油,放入葱花爆香,放入西红柿翻炒出汁。 放入土豆,胡萝卜,翻炒均匀。 放入适量水,大火烧开,转小火煮10分钟。 放入盐,香油调味,出锅。

source: Title: Chocolate Chiffon Cake, Ingredients: 1/2 c. cocoa 3/4 c. boiling water 1 3/4 c. sifted cake flour 1 3/4 c. sugar 1/2 c. oil 1 Tbsp. baking powder 6 eggs, separated 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. vanilla 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar, Steps: Dissolve cocoa in boiling water. Cool. Sift dry ingredients together. Add oil, egg yolks, cocoa mixture and vanilla. Mix well. Combine egg whites and cream of tartar; beat until stiff peaks form. Fold egg yolk mixture into egg whites. Pour into 10-inch tube pan. Bake at 325° for 1 hour and 10 minutes. Put Fudge Topping on cake (see recipe).
references: Title: 电饭锅巧克力戚风蛋糕, Ingredients: 80g低筋面粉 10g可可粉 5个鸡蛋 40g玉米油 50g牛奶 30g50g根据个人口味调整细砂糖 少许柠檬汁 少许盐, Steps: 首先把鸡蛋的蛋清和蛋黄分离注意：如果蛋黄不慎破了，流入蛋清，会造成后面蛋白霜打发不起的情况。如遇到此状况，最好重新开始 把30g细砂糖，50g牛奶，40g玉米油和蛋黄，用手动打蛋器搅拌均匀。 把80g低筋面粉和10g可可粉过筛，加入蛋黄液。 用打蛋器最低档搅拌至无颗粒注意不要过度，造成面筋，放在一旁待用。 在蛋白里加入少许柠檬汁和少许盐没有柠檬汁可以用白醋代替，此步骤主要是去除蛋白的腥味。 电动打蛋器打发蛋白，打至出鱼眼泡时，分三次加入50g细砂糖，继续打发。 直到蛋白可以拉出小勾，打发完成。 先挖一勺蛋白霜加入面糊，翻拌均匀，然后把面糊分三次加入蛋白霜翻拌均匀，至无大气泡。 在电饭锅的底部抹上一点油，把翻拌好的面糊倒入电饭锅 整个过程需要1小时。每个电饭锅的功能不同，根据实际情况选择功能。 开锅，把蛋糕倒扣，几分钟后就会脱模，完成。
prediction: Title: 巧克力熔岩蛋糕, Ingredients: 100克黑巧克力 100克黄油 100克低筋面粉 1个鸡蛋 50克细砂糖 2克泡打粉, Steps: 黄油室温软化,加入细砂糖搅拌均匀 加入鸡蛋搅拌均匀 筛入低筋面粉和泡打粉搅拌均匀 倒入巧克力糊搅拌均匀 烤箱预热180度,中层烤20分钟左右

source: Title: Pumpkin Scones, Ingredients: FOR THE SCONES: 1 cup Flour 2 Tablespoons Dark Brown Sugar 1/2 Tablespoons Baking Powder 2 teaspoons Pumpkin Pie Spice 1/4 teaspoons Salt 1/2 cups Canned Pumpkin Puree 2 Tablespoons Pumpkin Spiced Coffee Creamer 1/4 teaspoons Vanilla Extract FOR THE MAPLE GLAZE: 1/2 cups Powdered Sugar 3 Tablespoons Maple Syrup 1 pinch Pumpkin Pie Spice, Steps: Preheat the oven to 425°F and line a baking sheet with a silicone mat or parchment paper. In a large mixing bowl, whisk the flour, brown sugar, baking powder, pumpkin pie spice and salt together to aerate them. Gently stir in the pumpkin puree, coffee creamer and vanilla until a soft dough starts to form. Turn out the dough on to a clean, floured surface. Knead the dough for 4 to 5 turns to bring it together into a uniform ball. Gently flatten the ball and pat it out into thin circle. Use a knife to cut the circle into 8 equal wedges. Do this by quartering the circle and then cutting each quarter in half. Transfer the wedges to the lined baking sheet and bake the scones for 14-15 minutes. While the scones bake, prepare the simple glaze. Simply combine the powdered sugar, maple syrup and pumpkin pie spice in a shallow bowl and stir it all together until it becomes a smooth glaze. When the scones are done, take them out and let them cool on the sheet for a minute. Take each slightly cooled scone and dip the tops of them in the glaze to coat them. Transfer them to a rack to finish cooling. Make sure there is a sheet of aluminum foil underneath to catch the drippings. It makes clean up so much easier. Serve with some great tea or coffee for an amazing breakfast treat or afternoon snack!
references: Title: 葡萄司康, Ingredients: 50g黄油 140g自发粉 60g留少许刷面牛奶 30g葡萄干, Steps: 室温软化的黄油和自发粉搓匀，像面包糠状 加入葡萄干拌匀，分次加入牛奶和成团 擀成2cm厚用模具压制成型 摆放在烤盘上，刷层牛奶，入预热好的烤箱烤制
prediction: Title: 南瓜饼, Ingredients: 适量南瓜 适量糯米粉 适量白糖, Steps: 南瓜去皮切块蒸熟,捣成泥 加入糯米粉和白糖,揉成光滑的面团,盖上保鲜膜醒发20分钟 将醒发好的面团擀成薄片,用模具压出形状,放入蒸锅中,大火蒸15分钟即可
